summary: Two private bankers, Alistair and Jamie, who have the world at their feet get their kicks from playing a 12 hour game of hunt, hide and seek with people from the margins of society. Their ... See full summary »
cast: James Anthony Pearson|Dougray Scott|Alastair Mackenzie|Charles Mnene|Liz White|John Gray|Rebecca Palmer|Shelley Conn|Neil McNulty|Ruaraidh Murray|Sheila Donald|Jamie Michie|Jenny Foulds|Leon Butler|Edie Jobson|Jamie Hayden|Karen Gillan|Tim Barrow|Terry Cade|Rodd Christensen|Michael Moreland|Christina Strachan|Billy Riddoch|Arran Topham|Millie Jobson|Sophie Sullivan|Kate Byrne|Ben Bradley|Kim Chapman|Joseph Muir|Pete Murphy
title: New Town Killers
